title: Cheat Aru Kedo Mattari Kurashitai 《Tensei Jinsei o Tanoshimou!》 - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Age Progression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Familial Love   Famous Parents   Famous Protagonist   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Godly Powers   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Knowledge   Overpowered Protagonist   Overprotective Siblings   Politics   Polygamy   Pregnancy   R-15   Reincarnation   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Nanjamonja   なんじゃもんじゃ
description:
While out walking the MC stumbles upon a crime scene.

He immediately tries to escape but gets stabbed.

When he came to, he found that the people around him were speaking a language he didn’t understand. Even among the 6 languages he knew it was something foreign.

Although seemingly having been transported into another world, he discovers that his original body did not follow with him. Instead he is now in the body of Christopher, a sickly boy of 11 years old.

What will he do with his new life in a different body?>
